title: unexpected panic: 'index out of bounds' in src/libsyntax/lib.rs:1

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
viewable in code by running "cargo test" on https://github.com/compwron/apod-rs/commit/a384171e0a07d001775e76c4835b0d97b869b904

```
rustc --version --verbose
rustc 1.0.0-dev
binary: rustc
commit-hash: unknown
commit-date: unknown
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.0.0-dev
```
